name: extended-typescript-sdk
description: Unofficial TypeScript SDK for Extended Exchange - A perpetual DEX built by ex-Revolut team

scripts.build: npm run build:signer && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:signer:custom: cd wasm-signer && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../wasm && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../wasm-web-temp && node -e "const fs=require('fs');['stark_crypto_wasm.js','stark_crypto_wasm_bg.wasm','stark_crypto_wasm.d.ts'].forEach(f=>{const src=`../wasm-web-temp/${f}`;const dest=`../wasm/${f.replace('.js','-web.js').replace('.wasm','-web.wasm').replace('.d.ts','-web.d.ts')}`;if(fs.existsSync(src))fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);});fs.rmSync('../wasm-web-temp',{recursive:true,force:true});"
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist wasm wasm-signer/pkg wasm-signer/pkg-web wasm-signer/target

author: bvvvp009
